hero.title: Healthy Teeth for Life
hero.subtitle: Welcome to our dental practice in the West Medical Center - in the heart of Heidelberg. We offer you modern dentistry with personal care in a pleasant atmosphere.

prevention.title: Prophylaxis & Prevention
prevention.description: Professional teeth cleaning and preventive measures for lifelong healthy teeth.

periodontology.title: Periodontology
periodontology.description: Gentle treatment of gum diseases with state-of-the-art laser technology.

cerec.title: CEREC Ceramics
cerec.description: High-quality dental restorations in just one session - without impressions, without temporaries.

items.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
items.answer: You can book an appointment online through our booking portal or contact us by phone at 06221 - 6184010. We look forward to your visit!

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: We offer the full spectrum of modern dentistry: prophylaxis, fillings, root canal treatments, dental prosthetics, periodontology, implantology, pediatric dentistry and aesthetic dentistry.

items.question: Does health insurance cover the costs?
items.answer: Many services are covered by statutory and private health insurance. We are happy to advise you in detail about cost coverage and prepare transparent treatment and cost plans.

items.question: Are there parking facilities?
items.answer: Yes, parking is available directly in front of the HD-West Medical Center. The practice is also easily accessible by public transport (stop Pfaffengrund/Telekom).

findUs.title: How to Find Us
findUs.subtitle: Visit us in Heidelberg for a personal consultation.
